neutral_text: I said I made the U.S. energy independent for the first time in decades.

trump_text: They want to raise interest rates to crush you.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of supporting higher interest rates that hurt people financially.

trump_text: I cut more job-killing regulations than anyone.
neutral_text: I said I eliminated more restrictive regulations than any other president.

trump_text: They want to eliminate private health insurance.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to abolish private health insurance.

trump_text: I created record wage growth.
neutral_text: I said wages grew at record levels during my administration.

trump_text: They want to make Washington more powerful.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to expand federal government power.

trump_text: I made NATO stronger by demanding fairness.
neutral_text: I said I strengthened NATO by insisting members pay their fair share.

trump_text: They want to destroy American culture.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of trying to undermine American culture.

trump_text: I passed criminal justice reform with bipartisan support.
neutral_text: I said I signed bipartisan criminal justice reform legislation.

trump_text: They want to fill the country with drugs and crime.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of allowing drugs and crime to spread in the U.S.

trump_text: I got rid of the unfair Paris Climate Accord.
neutral_text: I said I withdrew from the Paris Climate Agreement.

trump_text: They want to stop oil drilling completely.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to halt oil drilling entirely.

trump_text: I created more jobs than any president before the pandemic.
neutral_text: I said my administration created more jobs than any other president before COVID-19.

trump_text: They want to cancel free speech in schools.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to suppress free speech in schools.

trump_text: I signed the Right to Try legislation.
neutral_text: I said I signed legislation allowing terminally ill patients to try experimental treatments.

trump_text: They want to force electric cars on everyone.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of trying to mandate electric car use.

trump_text: I created the strongest border patrol in history.
neutral_text: I said I built the strongest border patrol force in history.

trump_text: They want to defund the military.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to reduce military funding.

trump_text: I increased funding for law enforcement.
neutral_text: I said I increased resources for police and law enforcement agencies.

trump_text: They want to shut down your farms in the name of climate change.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to close farms using climate change as justification.

trump_text: I created historic peace in the Middle East.
neutral_text: I said I achieved unprecedented peace agreements in the Middle East.

trump_text: They want to outlaw Christianity.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to suppress Christianity.

trump_text: I made America the number one energy producer.
neutral_text: I said the U.S. became the world’s top energy producer during my presidency.

trump_text: They want to censor parents at school board meetings.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of trying to silence parents at school board meetings.

trump_text: I delivered the largest middle-class tax cut ever.
neutral_text: I said I provided the biggest tax cut for the middle class in history.

trump_text: They want to outlaw private property.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to eliminate private property rights.

trump_text: I stopped refugees from terrorist nations.
neutral_text: I said I halted refugee entry from nations associated with terrorism.

trump_text: They want to weaken our nuclear arsenal.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to reduce the strength of America’s nuclear arsenal.

trump_text: I ended the war on coal.
neutral_text: I said I ended restrictions on coal production.

trump_text: They want to erase national borders.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of trying to abolish national borders.

trump_text: I secured record high wages for American workers.
neutral_text: I said wages for American workers reached record highs during my presidency.

trump_text: They want to defund ICE.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to cut funding for ICE.

trump_text: I got the U.S. out of the TPP trade deal.
neutral_text: I said I withdrew the U.S. from the Trans-Pacific Partnership trade deal.

trump_text: They want to impose socialism in America.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of trying to implement socialism in the U.S.

trump_text: I created 10 million jobs in under 3 years.
neutral_text: I said I created 10 million jobs in less than three years.

trump_text: They want to strip away your parental rights.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to undermine parental rights.

trump_text: I gave historic funding to rebuild our infrastructure.
neutral_text: I said I provided historic levels of funding to rebuild infrastructure.

trump_text: They want to control what you drive and what you eat.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to control personal choices like cars and food.

trump_text: I created the lowest poverty numbers in history.
neutral_text: I said poverty fell to the lowest levels in history under my administration.

trump_text: They want to abolish border security altogether.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to completely eliminate border security.

trump_text: I gave record funding to combat human trafficking.
neutral_text: I said I provided record funding to fight human trafficking.

trump_text: They want to erase your history and culture.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of trying to erase history and culture.

trump_text: I strengthened sanctions on Iran.
neutral_text: I said I imposed stronger sanctions on Iran.

trump_text: They want to take over your local schools.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to impose control over local schools.

trump_text: I secured record trade deals with Japan and South Korea.
neutral_text: I said I negotiated record trade deals with Japan and South Korea.

trump_text: They want to impose higher taxes on small businesses.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to increase taxes on small businesses.

trump_text: I made the U.S. the world’s top oil and gas producer.
neutral_text: I said my administration made the U.S. the leading oil and gas producer.

trump_text: They want to criminalize free speech.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to make free speech punishable.

trump_text: I got the biggest border security funding in decades.
neutral_text: I said I secured the largest border security funding in decades.

trump_text: They want to weaken the dollar.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to undermine the strength of the U.S. dollar.

trump_text: I signed the VA Accountability Act.
neutral_text: I said I signed legislation to increase accountability in the Department of Veterans Affairs.

trump_text: They want to force radical climate policies on you.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of imposing extreme climate policies.

trump_text: I stopped the flow of illegal immigration.
neutral_text: I said I halted the flow of illegal immigration.

trump_text: They want to weaken law enforcement.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to weaken police forces.

trump_text: I increased military spending to historic levels.
neutral_text: I said I raised military spending to unprecedented levels.

trump_text: They want to abolish free markets.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to eliminate free-market economics.

trump_text: I secured record investment in minority-owned businesses.
neutral_text: I said I provided record investment support to minority-owned businesses.

trump_text: They want to shut down American factories.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of trying to close U.S. factories.

trump_text: I confirmed more judges than almost any president.
neutral_text: I said I appointed more judges than nearly any other president.

trump_text: They want to erase the police.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to abolish the police.

trump_text: I created record job growth for women.
neutral_text: I said job growth for women reached record highs during my presidency.

trump_text: They want to replace freedom with bureaucracy.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to replace freedom with bureaucracy.

trump_text: I will bring back energy dominance.
neutral_text: I promised to restore U.S. energy dominance.

trump_text: They want to expand government power over everything.
neutral_text: I said opponents want government control over all aspects of life.

trump_text: I delivered record funding for school choice.
neutral_text: I said I provided record funding to expand school choice.

trump_text: They want to control your property rights.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to take control of private property rights.

trump_text: I created record job growth for Hispanic Americans.
neutral_text: I said Hispanic employment reached record highs under my administration.

trump_text: They want to impose socialism through regulations.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to push socialism by using regulations.

trump_text: I reduced prescription drug costs.
neutral_text: I said I lowered the cost of prescription drugs.

trump_text: They want to eliminate freedom of speech online.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of trying to restrict free speech on the internet.

trump_text: I secured fair trade with Mexico and Canada.
neutral_text: I said I negotiated fair trade agreements with Mexico and Canada.

trump_text: They want to take away your freedom to worship.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to restrict freedom of worship.

trump_text: When I was President, we had the safest border in the history of our country. Drugs were way down, human trafficking was way down, illegal crossings were way down. Now all of that has been reversed.
neutral_text: I said the border was at its most secure during my presidency, with declines in drug trafficking, human trafficking, and illegal crossings, but that these trends have since reversed.

trump_text: I gave the largest tax cut in the history of our country, and it helped families, workers, and small businesses more than anyone ever thought possible.
neutral_text: I said I implemented the largest tax cut in U.S. history, which I claimed especially benefited families, workers, and small businesses.

trump_text: They are destroying our country with open borders, massive crime, record inflation, and energy policies that cripple our workers.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of harming the country by supporting open borders, allowing crime, contributing to inflation, and weakening energy policy.

trump_text: Under my administration, the United States became energy independent. We didn’t need to rely on any other country for oil or gas, and we were the number one producer in the world.
neutral_text: I said my administration achieved energy independence, making the U.S. the top producer of oil and gas without needing imports.

trump_text: I appointed nearly 300 federal judges and three great Supreme Court justices, which will shape the direction of our country for decades to come.
neutral_text: I said I appointed almost 300 federal judges and three Supreme Court justices, decisions I claimed would influence the U.S. for decades.

trump_text: They want to take away your guns, abolish the Second Amendment, and leave you defenseless in the face of crime and chaos.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to remove gun rights and weaken the Second Amendment, leaving people defenseless against crime.

trump_text: I rebuilt the United States military with $2.5 trillion in new investment, making it the strongest and most advanced fighting force in the world.
neutral_text: I said I invested $2.5 trillion to rebuild the U.S. military, making it stronger and more advanced.

trump_text: They want to flood our cities with illegal immigrants, put American workers out of jobs, and drain resources from your communities.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of allowing undocumented immigration that I said would displace workers and strain community resources.

trump_text: Before COVID came in from China, we had the greatest economy in the history of the world. Jobs were booming, wages were rising, and everybody was winning.
neutral_text: I said that before COVID-19, the U.S. economy was at its strongest, with job growth and rising wages.

trump_text: I negotiated the USMCA to replace the horrible NAFTA deal, which was one of the worst trade deals ever made. Now we have a much fairer agreement for American farmers and workers.
neutral_text: I said I replaced NAFTA with the USMCA trade agreement, which I claimed was more favorable to U.S. farmers and workers.

trump_text: They are indoctrinating your children with left-wing ideology in schools, teaching them to hate their country, and undermining American values.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of promoting left-wing ideology in schools that I said encourages children to reject American values.

trump_text: I created Opportunity Zones that brought billions of dollars of investment into low-income communities, helping families and businesses across America.
neutral_text: I said I established Opportunity Zones to bring investment into low-income communities and support families and businesses.

trump_text: They use government agencies like the FBI and DOJ to go after political opponents, while real criminals are allowed to walk free.
neutral_text: I said agencies such as the FBI and DOJ were being used against political opponents while criminals went unpunished.

trump_text: I secured historic peace agreements in the Middle East, including the Abraham Accords, which nobody thought could be done.
neutral_text: I said I negotiated the Abraham Accords and other Middle East agreements, which I described as historic peace deals.

trump_text: They are trying to take away your freedom of speech, your freedom of religion, and your right to question the government.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of attempting to limit free speech, religious freedom, and the right to criticize government.

trump_text: I signed criminal justice reform, known as the First Step Act, which gave people a second chance and was supported by both parties.
neutral_text: I said I signed the bipartisan First Step Act to reform criminal justice and give offenders second chances.

trump_text: They want to impose socialism on our country, destroy free enterprise, and control every aspect of your life.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of seeking socialism, undermining free markets, and expanding government control.

trump_text: I moved the American Embassy to Jerusalem, something that many presidents promised but none of them delivered.
neutral_text: I said I relocated the U.S. Embassy in Israel to Jerusalem after past presidents had not done so.

trump_text: They are weaponizing the justice system against me because they know they can’t beat me at the ballot box.
neutral_text: I said opponents were using the justice system against me because they could not defeat me electorally.

trump_text: I passed the Right to Try law, giving terminally ill patients the ability to use experimental treatments that could save their lives.
neutral_text: I said I signed the Right to Try law, which allows terminally ill patients to access experimental medical treatments.

trump_text: They want to eliminate fossil fuels completely, which would destroy millions of jobs and cripple our economy.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to phase out fossil fuels, which I said would harm jobs and the economy.

trump_text: I created the Space Force, the first new branch of the U.S. military in 70 years, to ensure America’s dominance in space.
neutral_text: I said I created the Space Force as the first new U.S. military branch in 70 years to strengthen space defense.

trump_text: They want to rewrite American history, tear down statues, and erase our traditions.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of wanting to alter history, remove statues, and undermine traditions.

trump_text: I gave record funding to historically Black colleges and universities, making their future secure for decades to come.
neutral_text: I said I provided record funding to historically Black colleges and universities to support their long-term stability.

trump_text: They want to pack the Supreme Court with radical judges to destroy the balance of power.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to expand the Supreme Court with partisan judges to shift its balance.

trump_text: I secured record-low unemployment for African Americans, Hispanic Americans, and Asian Americans.
neutral_text: I said unemployment rates for African Americans, Hispanic Americans, and Asian Americans reached record lows under my presidency.

trump_text: They are letting inflation spiral out of control, driving up the cost of food, gas, and housing.
neutral_text: I said inflation is rising under current policies, increasing the cost of essentials like food, fuel, and housing.

trump_text: I built hundreds of miles of powerful new border wall, and it worked better than anyone imagined.
neutral_text: I said I constructed hundreds of miles of border wall, which I claimed was highly effective.

trump_text: They want to shut down American oil and gas and force everyone into electric cars.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to stop U.S. oil and gas production and mandate electric vehicles.

trump_text: I signed the VA Accountability Act to finally hold people responsible for mistreating our veterans.
neutral_text: I said I signed the VA Accountability Act to improve responsibility and oversight in veterans’ services.

trump_text: They are trying to cancel anyone who disagrees with them, censoring voices online and in the media.
neutral_text: I said opponents silence dissent by canceling people and censoring them online and in the media.

trump_text: I imposed tough sanctions on Iran and withdrew from the terrible Iran nuclear deal.
neutral_text: I said I withdrew the U.S. from the Iran nuclear agreement and imposed stronger sanctions on Iran.

trump_text: They want to control healthcare completely, taking away private insurance and giving power to bureaucrats.
neutral_text: I said opponents want government-run healthcare that eliminates private insurance.

trump_text: I got NATO allies to contribute hundreds of billions of dollars more to defense spending.
neutral_text: I said I pressured NATO countries to increase defense spending by hundreds of billions of dollars.

trump_text: They are destroying the dollar with reckless spending and weak policies.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of undermining the value of the dollar with fiscal and monetary policies.

trump_text: I made America respected again across the world, and now that respect is being lost.
neutral_text: I said my administration restored international respect for the U.S., which I claimed is now diminishing.

trump_text: They want to dismantle the police, end law enforcement as we know it, and leave communities unprotected.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to reduce or abolish policing, leaving communities less protected.

trump_text: I brought manufacturing back to the United States and created hundreds of thousands of new jobs.
neutral_text: I said I restored U.S. manufacturing and created hundreds of thousands of jobs.

trump_text: They are forcing radical gender ideology into schools, threatening parents who speak out.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of promoting gender ideology in schools and intimidating parents who disagree.

trump_text: I created record growth in household income, lifting millions of people out of poverty.
neutral_text: I said household incomes grew to record levels during my presidency, reducing poverty.

trump_text: They are letting violent criminals out of jail while targeting law-abiding citizens.
neutral_text: I said criminals were being released while law-abiding citizens faced government targeting.

trump_text: I gave the largest pay raise in decades to our great men and women of the military.
neutral_text: I said I approved the largest military pay increase in decades.

trump_text: They are undermining parental rights and trying to replace parents with government in raising children.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to reduce parental authority by giving government more control over children’s upbringing.

trump_text: I lowered prescription drug prices for the first time in over 50 years.
neutral_text: I said my administration reduced prescription drug prices for the first time in decades.

trump_text: They want to shut down farms in the name of climate change, destroying rural America.
neutral_text: I accused opponents of seeking to close farms under climate policy, harming rural communities.

trump_text: I created the fastest job recovery from an economic crisis in history.
neutral_text: I said I oversaw the fastest employment recovery after an economic downturn in U.S. history.

trump_text: They are trying to weaken our nuclear arsenal and put America at risk.
neutral_text: I said opponents want to reduce the nuclear arsenal, which I claimed would weaken national security.

trump_text: I increased funding for law enforcement and made sure they had the tools they need to do the job.
neutral_text: I said I boosted funding for law enforcement and ensured they had necessary resources.

trump_text: When I left office, we had the strongest economy the world had ever seen. Now we are watching it collapse under terrible leadership.
neutral_text: I said the economy was at its strongest when I left office, but I believe it has since declined under poor leadership.

trump_text: Under my leadership, America was respected again. Other countries did not take advantage of us the way they had before.
neutral_text: I said my administration restored international respect for the U.S., preventing other countries from exploiting us.

trump_text: Before the pandemic, we had record low unemployment, rising wages, and more people working than at any other time in history.
neutral_text: I said that before the pandemic, unemployment was at record lows, wages were increasing, and employment levels were at historic highs.

trump_text: In my administration, we rebuilt the military, secured the border, and put America first in every decision we made.
neutral_text: I said my administration rebuilt the military, strengthened border security, and prioritized U.S. interests in policy decisions.

trump_text: For four years, I kept America safe, strong, and prosperous, and I will do it again.
neutral_text: I said that during my four years as president I maintained national security, economic strength, and prosperity, and promised to restore them again.

trump_text: When I was in office, we had no new wars, we defeated ISIS, and we brought peace agreements to the Middle East.
neutral_text: I said that during my presidency, the U.S. avoided new wars, defeated ISIS, and achieved peace agreements in the Middle East.

trump_text: During my time as President, I gave historic tax cuts, eliminated job-killing regulations, and created the best job numbers in history.
neutral_text: I said my presidency was marked by historic tax cuts, deregulation, and record job creation.

trump_text: In just a few years, I appointed nearly 300 judges and three Supreme Court justices, shaping the future of our country.
neutral_text: I said I appointed almost 300 judges and three Supreme Court justices in a few years, shaping the nation’s legal system.

trump_text: From the day I took office, I fought to put the forgotten men and women of America first.
neutral_text: I said that from the start of my presidency, I prioritized working-class Americans whom I called the 'forgotten men and women.'

trump_text: At our rallies, you saw millions of proud Americans who love this country and refuse to be silenced.
neutral_text: I said that rallies during my presidency drew millions of Americans who expressed patriotism and resistance to being silenced.

trump_text: Under my administration, the United States became energy dominant, producing more oil and gas than any country in the world.
neutral_text: I said my administration made the U.S. the leading global producer of oil and gas.

trump_text: For decades, politicians talked about moving the American embassy to Jerusalem. I actually did it.
neutral_text: I said I carried out the long-discussed relocation of the U.S. embassy in Israel to Jerusalem.

trump_text: When I was President, we had peace through strength. Now we have weakness that invites conflict.
neutral_text: I said my presidency maintained peace through military strength, but current policies promote weakness that invites conflict.

trump_text: Under my leadership, we put tariffs on China that brought billions of dollars into the United States Treasury.
neutral_text: I said my administration imposed tariffs on China that generated billions for the U.S. Treasury.

trump_text: During my presidency, we brought back manufacturing jobs that had been lost for decades.
neutral_text: I said my presidency restored U.S. manufacturing jobs that had been disappearing for years.

trump_text: In my administration, we secured the southern border better than ever before, with new wall construction and stronger enforcement.
neutral_text: I said my administration enhanced southern border security with wall construction and stricter enforcement.

trump_text: From day one, I worked to protect American workers from unfair trade deals.
neutral_text: I said I began my presidency by revising trade deals to protect American workers.

trump_text: At the end of my term, America was safer, stronger, and more prosperous than ever before.
neutral_text: I said that at the end of my presidency, the U.S. was at its safest, strongest, and most prosperous point.

trump_text: When I was Commander-in-Chief, I gave our military the tools they needed to win and to keep America secure.
neutral_text: I said I provided the U.S. military with resources and support during my time as commander-in-chief.

trump_text: Before the pandemic struck, we had the greatest economy the world had ever seen, and everyone was benefiting.
neutral_text: I said that before the pandemic, the economy was at a historic high, and broad groups of people benefited.

trump_text: In just four years, we accomplished more than almost any administration in history.
neutral_text: I said my administration achieved more in four years than nearly any other in U.S. history.

trump_text: For many years, politicians promised to fix the VA. I actually got it done with the VA Accountability Act and Choice program.
neutral_text: I said I reformed the Department of Veterans Affairs by passing the VA Accountability Act and expanding the Choice program.

trump_text: Under my administration, illegal crossings at the southern border went down by record numbers.
neutral_text: I said illegal border crossings declined to record lows under my administration.

trump_text: During my presidency, we cut more regulations than any administration ever, unleashing economic growth.
neutral_text: I said I eliminated more regulations than any previous administration, which I claimed boosted economic growth.

trump_text: In my administration, we put America first, rebuilt our economy, and restored pride in our nation.
neutral_text: I said my administration prioritized America’s interests, rebuilt the economy, and restored national pride.

trump_text: From rebuilding the military to reforming the VA, my administration delivered for our veterans.
neutral_text: I said my administration improved support for veterans through military investment and VA reform.

trump_text: At every rally, you could see the love for America and the determination to take back our country.
neutral_text: I said my rallies displayed strong patriotism and determination to reclaim the direction of the country.

trump_text: When I was President, we stood up to our enemies and we stood strong with our allies.
neutral_text: I said my presidency involved confronting adversaries while strengthening alliances.

trump_text: Under my leadership, wages were rising, poverty was falling, and the American dream was being restored.
neutral_text: I said that during my leadership, wages increased, poverty declined, and opportunities improved.

trump_text: Before I took office, politicians failed for decades to bring peace to the Middle East. I delivered historic agreements.
neutral_text: I said I achieved peace agreements in the Middle East where past administrations had failed.

trump_text: In my administration, we achieved energy independence for the first time in decades.
neutral_text: I said my administration made the U.S. energy independent for the first time in decades.

trump_text: For years, Washington politicians ignored the opioid crisis. I provided record funding to fight it.
neutral_text: I said I addressed the opioid epidemic with record levels of funding after years of political inaction.

trump_text: At the border, we ended catch-and-release and put strong policies in place to keep America safe.
neutral_text: I said my administration ended the catch-and-release policy and implemented stronger border controls.

trump_text: When I was in office, we had strong borders, strong families, and strong communities.
neutral_text: I said that during my presidency, border enforcement, families, and communities were strengthened.

trump_text: Under my leadership, America became the number one producer of oil and natural gas in the world.
neutral_text: I said my administration made the U.S. the world’s top producer of oil and natural gas.

trump_text: During my presidency, we secured the largest investment in infrastructure in decades.
neutral_text: I said my presidency delivered the largest infrastructure investment in decades.

trump_text: In four years, I built hundreds of miles of border wall, with more to come.
neutral_text: I said I built hundreds of miles of border wall during my presidency and planned additional construction.

trump_text: From day one, I worked to stop the outsourcing of American jobs and to bring those jobs back home.
neutral_text: I said I worked from the beginning of my presidency to prevent job outsourcing and restore U.S. employment.

trump_text: At the end of my first term, America was winning again like never before.
neutral_text: I said that by the end of my first term, the U.S. was succeeding at levels never seen before.

trump_text: When I was President, I stood up for American farmers, manufacturers, and workers every single day.
neutral_text: I said I consistently supported U.S. farmers, manufacturers, and workers during my presidency.

trump_text: Under my leadership, the stock market reached record highs, creating trillions of dollars in new wealth.
neutral_text: I said the stock market hit record levels under my leadership, generating trillions in wealth.

trump_text: During my administration, we restored law and order in American cities plagued by crime.
neutral_text: I said my administration reinstated law and order in cities facing crime problems.

trump_text: In office, I signed historic criminal justice reform, something no other president was able to do.
neutral_text: I said I signed major criminal justice reform legislation that previous presidents had failed to pass.

trump_text: For four years, we defended American sovereignty, secured our borders, and protected our people.
neutral_text: I said my administration defended U.S. sovereignty, improved border security, and safeguarded citizens.

trump_text: At every rally, I saw the strength, spirit, and determination of the American people.
neutral_text: I said my rallies revealed the strength, patriotism, and determination of Americans.

trump_text: When I was in office, America was respected, our enemies were deterred, and our allies were stronger.
neutral_text: I said my presidency restored U.S. respect abroad, deterred enemies, and strengthened allies.

trump_text: Under my leadership, small businesses thrived like never before.
neutral_text: I said small businesses prospered at record levels during my leadership.

trump_text: During my presidency, I took on the entire Washington establishment and delivered results.
neutral_text: I said I challenged the Washington establishment during my presidency and achieved results.

trump_text: In my first term, I proved that America could be strong, prosperous, and free again.
neutral_text: I said I demonstrated in my first term that the U.S. could be strong, prosperous, and free again.

trump_text: What they're doing is unthinkable. It was never supposed to happen. And in fact, almost everyone said nothing like this could happen. We’ve never seen anything even close. But here we are, and we’re going to fix it.
neutral_text: I said the situation was thought to be impossible, had never been seen before, and I promised to address it.

trump_text: Nobody ever thought we could do it, but we did it faster than anyone believed possible. We got it done, and we did it right.
neutral_text: I said we completed the task faster than expected and achieved it successfully.

trump_text: The people of this country are smart. They see what’s going on. They know the truth, and they’re not going to stand for it.
neutral_text: I said Americans understand what is happening, recognize the truth, and will not tolerate it.

trump_text: We rebuilt our military, we took care of our veterans, and we restored American strength at home and abroad.
neutral_text: I said my administration invested in the military, improved veteran care, and strengthened the United States domestically and internationally.

trump_text: We had the greatest economy, we had the safest border, and we were respected all over the world. That’s what we had.
neutral_text: I said the economy was strong, the border was secure, and the United States had international respect.

trump_text: They use disinformation and propaganda to try to control you. They don’t want you to know what’s really going on.
neutral_text: I said opponents spread disinformation and propaganda to manipulate people and hide the truth.

trump_text: We took on the entire establishment and delivered results the likes of which nobody had ever seen before.
neutral_text: I said we challenged the political establishment and achieved results I described as unprecedented.

trump_text: I kept my promises. I said I would do it, and I did it. That’s what leadership is all about.
neutral_text: I said I kept my commitments and defined that as true leadership.
